summary: This tiny little mod removes the salt pile requirement for all cooking recipes that come with the DLCs that add new food items as well as the already existing base game items. (Skyrim, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn)
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]I know there are 3 already existing salt pile requirement removal related mods out there, but none of them mention DLC support so I just went into the Creation Kit and made one myself that edits the recipes for base game and all DLCs applicable. So it's technically multi-language for anyone to use.

I changed the oven cooking recipes as well as regular cooking pot recipes.

If I miss anything please let me know.Â 

[u]There are 4 plugins packed within the main file[/u]
[/size]
Combined Plugin ([color=#ff0000]REQ:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Hearthfires.esm, Dragonborn.esm): [color=#ffff00]SaltRemoval_LegendaryEdition.esp
[/color]
Skyrim Base Game Plugin ([color=#ff0000]REQ:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm): [color=#ffff00]SaltRemoval_Skyrim+Update.esp
[/color]
Hearthfire DLC Plugin ([color=#ff0000]REQ:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Hearthfires.esm): [color=#ffff00]SaltRemoval_HearthfireDLC.esp
[/color]
Dragonborn DLC Plugin ([color=#ff0000]REQ:[/color] Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dragonborn.esm): [color=#ffff00]SaltRemoval_DragonbornDLC.esp
[/color][size=2]
[/size][color=#6d9eeb]This mod edits the vanilla recipes so I'm guessing there is a possibility of it not being compatible with something else that does the same.[/color]
author: marieruth
